definitions: the action of attaching a label to someone or something

examples.text: the tagging of birds with official numbered metal bands

shortDefinitions: action of attaching label to someone or something

definitions: the attaching of electronic markers to people or goods for monitoring purposes

examples.text: a new system of individual sheep tagging

shortDefinitions: attaching of electronic markers for monitoring

definitions: the writing of a nickname or mark on a surface by a graffiti artist

examples.text: tagging is out of control in this city

shortDefinitions: writing of nickname or mark on surface by graffiti artist

definitions: the adding of an instruction to a piece of text in a markup language in order to specify how it is displayed or interpreted

examples.text: internal review procedures to promote accurate and consistent tagging

shortDefinitions: adding of instruction to piece of text in markup language

definitions: the addition of a word, phrase, or name to digital content to identify it as belonging to a particular category or concerning a particular person or topic

examples.text: automatic tagging of your audio files with artist and track information

shortDefinitions: addition of word or name to digital content
